title: Uni
description: Sea urchin gonads. Exceptionally delicious to eat. Ocean pudding.

title: Wagyu
description: Intensely marbled Japanese beef. Best eaten on a skewer at a Japanese food market.

title: Baguette
description: A French bread with a crusty exterior and soft interior. Commonly used as a sandwich bread.

title: Oyster
description: Consider the oyster. They taste like violets. Silky and plump, I prefer sweet oysters to briny ones.

title: Croissants
description: Flakey and buttery, these treats run out far too quickly at the office.

title: Caviar
description: Red caviar comes from salmon eggs, they're fun to burst against the roof of your mouth. The fancier and more expensive varities are good too.

title: Pasta
description: Easy, cheap and plentiful food to cook and eat when it's late at night and you're craving comfort food. Exceptional value for the price.

title: Biscuits
description: Flakey and buttery biscuits are best eaten with sausage gravy or butter with honey and salt.

title: Goat Cheese
description: Tangy, creamy, and reminds me of a sunny day in pastoral England.
